testTypeDeclRefErrorElements.errorMessage: ca.ubc.cs.reverb.indexer.IndexerException: Code element class name not selective enough to be used without package name

testMethodDeclCall.queryString: (+((+mypackage.Myclass Myclass) OR (mypackage AND Myclass)) mymethoddecl mymethodcall)

testMethodDeclCallErrorElements.errorMessage: ca.ubc.cs.reverb.indexer.IndexerException: Code element member name not selective enough to be used on its own

testStaticFieldRef.queryString: (+((+mypackage.Myclass Myclass) OR (mypackage AND Myclass)) mymethodcall MY_FIELD_REF) OR (+Myclass.mymethodcall) OR (+Myclass.MY_FIELD_REF)

testErrorElements.errorMessage: ca.ubc.cs.reverb.indexer.IndexerException: Code element class name not selective enough to be used without package name
